Class Phrase

  • java.lang.Object
    • Phrase

  • public class Phrase
extends java.lang.Object
    This is where the phrase is stored and can be accessed using the methods
    Version:
    1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      java.lang.String fullGuess(java.lang.String guess)
      takes the guess of the full phrase from the player and checks it against the game phrase
      void gameBoard()
      prints the game board out to the console
      boolean gameComplete()
      checks the two phrases against each other and returns a true or false

      takes the letter guessed from the game class and checks it against the game phrase

    • Method Detail

      • gameBoard

        public void gameBoard()
        prints the game board out to the console

      • makeGuess

        public int makeGuess(char letter)
        takes the letter guessed from the game class and checks it against the game phrase
        Parameters:
        letter - the letter guessed by the player
        Returns:
        whether that letter appears in the phrase and how many times

      • fullGuess

        public java.lang.String fullGuess(java.lang.String guess)
        takes the guess of the full phrase from the player and checks it against the game phrase
        Parameters:
        guess - phrase guess input from player
        Returns:
        the guessCount (lowered with each guess) times 200, providing the bonus points for a correct answer or the feedback that the answer was incorrect and 5 points docked from the bonus

      • gameComplete

        public boolean gameComplete()
        checks the two phrases against each other and returns a true or false
        Returns:
        if the whole phrase has been guessed
